entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableInterlocked.VolatileIsDefault #109572
  • [WASI] Options for implementing wasi-tls proposal #109569
  • [8.0] Assert contains failure, not found "Stopping after AOT" in Wasm.Build.Tests.NativeBuildTests.MonoAOTCross_WorksWithNoTrimming #109565
  • Consider publishing new version of System.Data.Common without transitive vulnerability #109551
  • AOT publish of project that uses lazy loading fails #109550
  • How to remove request-id and traceparent Header from HttpClient Request #109558
  • [API Proposal]: Apply [OverloadResolutionPriority] to Span-based MemoryExtensions overloads #109549
    10.0.0
  • Break base64 string after JsonObject to string method #109546
  • [mono][android][crash] inflated_method_equal [class.c : 1136] #109542
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 27 Regressions on 10/30/2024 5:40:05 PM #109555
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression in System.Collections.AddGivenSize #109557
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Vector Regressions on 10/31/2024 10:26:58 PM #109554
  • Hang during shutdown with Native AOT on IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources waiting for finalizers #109538
    9.0.x
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 Regressions on 11/1/2024 7:42:33 PM #109552
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: dotnet publish crashing when using PublishTrimmed option #109536
    10.0.0
  • android: Cannot detect when HTTPS server needs a client certificate with SocketsHttpHandler #109532
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_105474/Runtime_105474/Runtime_105474.cmd #109531

Closed

  • Consider releasing #107333 into dotnet 9 #109060
    9.0.x
  • CultureInfo on iOS doesn't have all the information that Windows or Android have. #109444
  • [Linux] Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E #13027
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: PemEncoding for UTF8 #99614
    10.0.0
  • typeof() prevents the assembly from unloading #109479
  • Assertion failed 'bPrev->HasFlag(BBF_RETLESS_CALL)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109515
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'this->Next()->KindIs(BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109514
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Creating a new thread from DllMain makes the program get stuck. #109543
  • Error in RuntimeInstance::GetThreadStore when calling a method from a static library. #108644
    Future
  • DefineConstants are getting overriden twice in Wasi.Build.Tests.csproj #108935
    10.0.0
  • Dispose error in System.Drawing.Brush #109533
  • Assembly::Load crashes C++/CLI app in try block with 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 #109242
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use type-level annotations for trimming/AOT analysis #109571
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP] Last Level Cache fix - .NET 8. #109567
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #109566
    needs-area-label
  • Change iOS PEM searcher to use PemEncoding.TryFindUtf8 #109564
    area-System.Security
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #109563
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Handle non-default active version and explicit IL code version cases for `CodeVersions.GetActiveNativeCodeVersion` #109560
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ILASM] Add wrappers for platform-specific SHA-256 implementations #109559
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109556
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • JIT: Fix codegen for misaligned double `STORE_LCL_FLD` on arm32 #109547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Block exporting DllMain #109545
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add GFNI Intrinsics #109537
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Repeat 3-opt layout for each region until convergence #109534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109530
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml #109528
    area-System.Xml

Merged

  • Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109458
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Add 1.1 runtime packages to PackageOverrides.txt #109553
    area-Setup
  • Remove unused `TypeHandle::GetDefiningModuleForOpenType` #109527
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.12 #109562
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove thread contention from Activity Start/Stop #109359
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.1
  • Add support for UTF-8 in PemEncoding #109438
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Reapply "Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type" #109525
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Unify DefineConstants #109541
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Eliminate redundant SafePasswordHandle values #109391
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Fix typo in PackageDownloadAndReference.targets #109197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest image #109454
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Don't convert unreachable `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` blocks to `BBJ_THROW` during morph #109519
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area owners #109509
    area-Meta
  • Do not override `DefineConstants` in WBT #109539
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • JIT: Add missing `lvTracked` check in `optLocalHasNonLoopUses` #109505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109524
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast in more places #109258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2575840 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0-staging] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109364
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109510
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109511
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.12
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Dedup remaining MemoryExtensions Span overloads #109501
    area-System.Memory
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Defer compilation in bblocks with unitialized stack #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44674
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44668
  • [VCPKG] Visual Studio Preview 5 v17.12 caused SDK Resolver Failure on Microsoft.Build.Vcpkg #44664
  • dotnet test doesn't forward build command line options correctly #44655

Closed

  • Could we add support for `dotnet tool update -g -all` #19650
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Fix char conversions #44661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add package source mappings unit-tests #44649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build #44631
    untriaged

Merged

  • Remove additional TL characters from the dotnet run output special casing for tests #44442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update branding to 9.0.101 #44660
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Outline of CLI UX/Option/behavior expectations for the dotnet CLI #43938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Support --ignore-failed-sources flag correctly #44487
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Tools, 8.0.12
  • Set mediaType from http response if manifest mediaType is not present #44530
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • [release/9.0.2xx] add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.405 #44653
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.308 #44652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.112 #44651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update tfm of dotnet/format test project to current #44498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.2xx #44563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Implement Interface #75760
  • Theoretical race condition in PETypeParameterSymbol (and possibly other locations) #75759
  • Area - Simplify Type Names #75755
  • Area - Naming Style #75754
  • Area - Move Type #75753
  • Area - Signature Help #75751
  • Area - Add Import #75750
  • Area - Change Signature #75749
  • Area - CodeLens #75748
  • Area - Generate Type #75747
  • Area - Rename #75746
  • Area - Extract Method #75745
  • Area - Debugger Integration #75744
  • Area - Edit and Continue #75743
  • Primary Constructor with Self-Type Parameter Creates Uninstantiable Class Without Compiler Error #75742
  • Area - Workspace #75741
  • Area - Navigate To #75740
  • Area - Move Declaration Near Reference #75739
  • Area - MSBuildWorkspace #75738
  • Area - Remove Unused Variable/Values #75737
  • Area - Go To Definition #75736
  • Area - Use Collection Initializer #75735
  • Area - Introduce Variable #75734
  • Area - Generate Constructor #75733
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Imports #75732
  • Area - Formatting #75731
  • Area - Xml Documentation Comments #75730
  • Area - Find All References #75729
  • Area - Completion #75727
  • Area - Quick Info #75726

Closed

  • Allow my source-generator to run before GeneratedRegex #75762
  • Rename does not work directly after ExtractMethod (with unknown parameter types) #10914
    Backlog
  • Proposal: generate XML doc comments with "Create and initialize property" Quick Action #19479
    Backlog
  • Naming styles options show up in the wrong language if you have multiple languages installed #18340
    Backlog
  • Adding Analyzers Via a Project Reference #18093
    Backlog
  • Using Go to Definition twice, causes a previewed "source as metadata" document to be promoted as an open document #17833
    Backlog
  • CSharpCodeActions.Add Using (fuzzy match) and related fixes after Rename Tracking Is Flakey #17818
    Backlog
  • Regression? Rename and Anonymous Types #17219
    Backlog
  • IDE0032 should not be specified for classes or structs with an explicit `StructLayout` attribute #17201
    Backlog
  • Rename tracking border shown in .cshtml files even though you can't trigger the light bulb #17017
    Backlog
  • Error message when defining named arguments to an implicitly defined tuple #16781
    Backlog
  • Invalid indent guides on else-if with multiline condition #16395
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio deadlocked closing a solution with many documents open #16030
    Backlog
  • Rename via a file that only differs causes an error and results in your changes being reverted #15918
    Backlog
  • Add Xaml, TypeScript and F# IDE tests #14578
    Backlog
  • Bring back Go to Definition Navigation Stack #14496
    Backlog
  • Cancelling a check-out prompt when retargeting portable shows 3 errors #14022
    Backlog
  • VB: Backspacing through identifier doesn't prefer exact matches #13958
    Backlog
  • Move type to file refactoring : detect conflicts ahead of time for Rename type to match file. #13584
    Backlog
  • Wrong number of overloads in QuickInfo #13462
    Backlog
  • Simplify Inline Temporary refactoring for tuples #11028
    Backlog
  • Progression type hierarchy doesn't launch Metadata-as-Source #7151
    Backlog
  • Inline rename shows error squiggles before commiting the change... #10100
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.UnitTests.Progression.InheritsGraphQueryTests.TestSolutionWithMultipleProjects (from Roslyn.VisualStudio.Services.UnitTests) #9653
    Backlog
  • Providing consistent behavior for Rename operation in custom files #9397
    Backlog
  • Consider pattern matching for extract method scenarios #9244
    Backlog
  • Analyzers and code fixes for converting Loop Family #8953
    Backlog
  • DocumentInfo.Create() allows you to create instances with a null TextLoader #7310
    Backlog
  • Analyzer installation script fails to add assemblies with different versions #6322
    Backlog
  • Re-add support for "Surround generated code with #region" option #4939
    Backlog
  • Adding AdditionalFiles Through VS Workspace #4425
    Backlog
  • Code Fix provider not being loaded when just added as an Analyzer in the project file #4330
    Backlog
  • snippet pasting does not honor the indenting mode #4284
    Backlog
  • Feature Request: Signature Help & Quick Info for collection initializers #3529
    Backlog
  • Connect: Cannot disable automatic indenting in Pretty Listing #2509
    Backlog
  • Renaming the default namespace should update the RootNamespace property of the project #2062
    Backlog
  • Remove trailing space after <enter> between arguments (etc.) #940
    Backlog
  • Ignore "Space after method name" option in Razor. #537
    Backlog
  • Code action which selects text #237
    Backlog
  • Adding a #pragma suppression can mess up trivia #228
    Backlog
  • [Regression] Visual Studio becomes unusable if you open large set of VB files #36899
    Backlog
  • Reenable GetHierarchy assertion #36223
    Backlog
  • "Calcualte Code Metrics" should be moved to Analyze sub menu on solution context #31322
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio becomes unresponsive if you attempt open a bunch of C# files #37264
    Backlog
  • VB XML doc inconsistency between template and IntelliSense for property (template contains <returns>, IntelliseSense not) #8627
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense gets confused by aliased references #11310
    Backlog
  • VB: commenting then un-commenting a block of code yields a different end-result #14308
    Backlog
  • Surround with messes the next line when whole lines are selected #36243
    Backlog
  • Brace formatting does not work with "Open Folder" #28553
    Backlog
  • Insert "await" code fix weirdly formats a multi-line lambda #30087
    Backlog
  • Add integration test for #4238 #4269
    Backlog
  • When the editor is in "user read-only" mode, users are offered code fixes that do nothing #4232
    Backlog
  • AdditionalFiles do not show up in CompilationStartAnalysisContext.Options.AdditionalFiles #12840
    Backlog
  • Remove CompilationOutputFilesWithImplicitPdbPath #35065
    Backlog
  • Add a code fix for going from "expression-body member" to "auto-property initializer" and vice versa #27948
    Backlog
  • Context tooltip for indent guides should say more than just "else". #15872
    Backlog
  • Need general IDE integration test that adds a bad piece of metadata so we can ensure that all metadata related features are resilient. #19412
    Backlog
  • New Feature Proposal: GoTo Type #2505
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb fails to drop down for specific Visual Basic constants #26674
    Backlog
  • Suggest to add/remove the 'in' parameter modifier #26657
    Backlog
  • Work we can add later for ForeachToFor refactoring #25667
    Backlog
  • Do not suggest overloads hidden by hidebyname #22009
    Backlog
  • selection doesn't work after deleting a character #23894
    Backlog
  • Should be able to specify two naming styles for a given symbol #23707
    Backlog
  • C# Code Containing LINQ Incorrectly Formatted When Using Surround With Snippet #23142
    Backlog
  • Undeclared compilation errors should fail analyzer/fixer tests #21550
    Backlog
  • Feature request: .editorconfig supports commas at end of certain members #21151
    Backlog
  • [Question] Using custom Roslyn dlls under custom built VS Next #20538
    Backlog
  • VB new preselection should not include the current error type #20461
    Backlog
  • Code Structure - Extend behavior to other structure components like paranthesis #17441
    Backlog
  • Extension methods, shouldn't show as extensions when accessed through static methods #16382
    Backlog
  • Support VS Editor Completion List tabs #14021
    Backlog
  • Add using for assembly attribute can introduce error with existing attribute in AssemblyInfo.cs #11755
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices should Embed Interop Types to VSLangProj #7292
    Backlog
  • Support surround with in VB #6538
    Backlog
  • Inline temp for an array literal with anonymous types in the initializer doesn't work #3315
    Backlog
  • Documentation missing for Workspace DocumentContext/RelatedDocuments #355
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35505.08 #75723

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder (#724… #75761
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Have the naming style fixer understand the 'I' pattern for interfaces better #75758
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve pattern matching when user is likely providing camel humps #75757
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Parse directives in trailing trivia as skipped tokens trivia #75724
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next
  • Allow renaming with overload resolution when there is only one overload #75752
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support navigating to metadata in progression results #75728
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add wrapper service broker to allow for easy MEF consumption #75717
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Also check if reference is isolated file reference for completion providers #75721
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use absolute path for CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath #75713
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement support for triggering Fix All from additional files #74695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Prototype string literals in data section #75557
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify Capacity growth rate to be linear instead of doubling on resize. #75708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add examples to xmldoc for AddOpenAPI extension methods/overloads #58807
  • .NET 9 - OpenAPI Not Generating Output #58805
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, mvc, plaintext #58804
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #58803
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.Http3.Http3RequestTests.POST_ClientCancellationUpload_RequestAbortRaised(protocol: Http3) #58802
  • ApiVersionMatchPolicy invalidates catch-all endpoint incorrectly #58795
  • QuickGrid throws InvokeAsync exception when RefreshDataAsync() is called #58794
  • Improve performance of ClaimsIdentity #58793
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • Modify the Blazor Web App template #53381
    9.0-preview2

    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor static SSR ExpressionFormatter.FormatLambda adds zero symbols \0\0\0\0 into an input name attribute value when it's size exceeds 128 symbols due to a bug in a ReverseStringBuilder #58689
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #58784
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md for project #27562
  • Perf regression: caching, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #58792
  • Improve experience for new contributors to repo #27380
  • [Blazor WASM] Razor helper methods will not render content when used as inner HTML of components #58717
  • Too many of the same ACCELERATE KEYS (Alt+I) when creating a new project Blazor web app #58750
    10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine Http2RequestTests.GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #52238
    Test failures
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #57944
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58086

PullRequests

Created

    area-web-frameworks
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #58801

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update Messagepack dependency #58676

  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561

  • [release/8.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.12
  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.12
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58741
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.12
  • Update branding to 8.0.12 #58800
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.12
  • Update milestones for Dec/Jan #58806
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix `ExpressionFormatter` sometimes generating malformed expression strings #58799
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Fixed the hot-keys for Blazor WebApp template options #58790
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Update Selenium packages #58791
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #58738

  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #58789

  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58788
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OnNavigatingFrom called even if not navigating back on swipe in IOS #25699
  • MAUI Geolocation from a known address #25698
  • [testing] Some builds hang when running iOS samples or template tests #25695
  • Splashscreen and Dark/Light theme behavior changed on Android #25693
  • Blazor Hybrid Webview cannot be force reloaded for urls containing query parameters with a dot (.) #25689
  • Can we get an answer please? #25688
  • SSlStream Authentication failing in .NET MAUI Android app whereas same is working in Xamarin.forms #25687
  • [WinUI] Editor width is not updated when setting styles for native view #25684
  • 8.0.92 make app size bigger #25683
  • OnNavigatedFrom is not triggered as expected from FlyoutPage.Detail #25682
  • [MacCatalyst] When using TabbedPage TabBar is not visible #25679
    .NET 9 SR1

Closed

  • BoxView with no dimension given in a grid is not displayed (unexpected behavior when migrating from Xamarin) #25442
  • [Android] Apps compiled for 15.0 / 35 default displaying as Edge to Edge #24742
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [ci] New templates failing on signing #25525
    Backlog
  • Maui Android deployment fails with error XABLD7023 #25583
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #25694
  • [iOS, 9.0 Preview 6] Build process of iOS projects with SkiaSharp hangs up in Release configuration in Visual Studio 17.11.0 Preview 4.0 #23776
  • Items in a Listview header don't receive gesture events #18793
  • [iOS] CarouselView content renders behind tab bar #17817
    Backlog
  • OnNavigatedFrom is not triggered as expected from FlyoutPage.Detail #25680

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip invalidation on propagation (#25652) #25696
    .NET 8 SR10
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Windows] Fix for the screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage #25690
    community ✨
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    community ✨
  • Fix minor online API docs warnings #25685
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Merged

  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR10
  • Skip invalidation on propagation #25652
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr10] Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25677

Updated

  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area-testing
  • Remove `MeasureInvalidated` bubble-up mechanism / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    community ✨
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    community ✨
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add analyzer for TestCase and missing Category #23465
    area-testing, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Add MSBuild glob for Windows Assets #23314
    area-single-project, platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR2
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR2
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR2
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    .NET 9 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core ValueConverter string to bool for nullable string column #35051
  • IsPrimitiveCollection metadata is incorrect when using the compiled model #35047
  • Being able to guarantee certain entity types are readonly (not tracked) at the dbcontext level, during Model configuration. #35046
  • Allow users to directly express a database cast to a specific store type (EF.Cast) #35045
    Backlog
  • EF generates sql statement for non existing column in a table #35044
  • DbUpdateException instead of DbUpdateConcurrencyException #35043
  • Nullable foreign key generates not nullable column on postgres #35039
  • Stop remapping lambda bodies to deal with parameters #35038
    Backlog

Closed

  • EF Core fails to translate LINQ query to SQL if JOIN contains multiple columns #35007
    10.0.0
  • Json: error when trying to materialize json entity with nullable property that is null in the json string - should materialize the property as null instead #34293
    10.0.0
  • Check that #35041
  • Mal schauen #35042
  • Should I use required modifier with navigations? #35031
  • Too many columns selected for collection subquery #34851

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35050
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #35049
  • Add requiredness to the debug view for navigations #35037

Merged

  • Fix to #35007 - EF Core fails to translate LINQ query to SQL if JOIN contains multiple columns #35019
  • Update branding to 8.0.12 #35048
  • Fix to #34293 - Json: error when trying to materialize json entity with nullable property that is null in the json string - should materialize the property as null instead #35040

Updated

  • Fix to #35024 - Query could not be translated when using a static ICollection/IList field #35029
